first_para: Hadleigh Roberts is a British Labour politician who is the 2015 UK General Election Labour Party candidate for Thornbury & Yate, having previously stood as a Labour candidate for South West England and Gibraltar in European Parliament election of 2014.

full.extract:
Hadleigh Roberts is a British Labour politician who is the 2015 UK General Election Labour Party candidate for Thornbury & Yate, having previously stood as a Labour candidate for South West England and Gibraltar in European Parliament election of 2014.

He works for a public relations firm.
full.title: Hadleigh Roberts
